[http://www.newenglandancestors.org/research/services/56_ancestry_john_mccain.asp "On the Ancestry, Royal Descent, and English and American Notable Kin of Senator John Sidney McCain IV"], New England Historic Genealogical Society ([[2008-04-01]]). Retrieved [[2008-05-19]].</ref> <ref name="somebody" >Roberts, Gary</ref> Text In Between Refs <ref name="somebody" /> There is an embedded image link here: [[Image:McCain2008MemorialDay.jpg|thumb|left|Speaking in [[Albuquerque, New Mexico]] on [[Memorial Day]], 2008, wearing his [[purple heart]]]] Text after Refs Also a [[non aliased link]] here.
